pipeline module¶

class pipeline.Pipeline(path, inputfile)¶

Bases: object

Instanciation of a specimen with loading the data set, claculating the target data and the parameters before fitting or starting data reduction algo.

Export_output(Output_file_name)¶

Export reduced data into an excel file

check_hyst()¶

Check the hysteresis before fitting and data reduction

check_reduced_hyst()¶

Check the hysteresis of the reduced data after fitting :return: a plot if requred

fit_epsilon()¶

Starting fitting

fract_zeit(eps_tol=0.03)¶

fraction time: this is not accurate for all test data set, another method should be implemented

run_reduction()¶

Run data reduction algo.

sub_ranges()¶

Deviding the data into sub ranges so that data reduction algo is optimized
